website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy spatula with multiple extras like a nice long handle that makes it ideal for using on your outdoor grill.
pros: This spatula is made of thick stainless steel that won't bend or break when flipping heavy foods
Added bonuses include a 16-inch long handle, a serrated edge for cutting food, and a contoured tip for easy release of foods from the grill or griddle
It even has a built-in bottle opener and is dishwasher safe
cons: The blade is on the small side and some users have complained about rusting associated with washing it in the dishwasher

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: You stand at your grill... The neighbors are watching you. You flip your burger patties like a pro, cut a cooked Bratt in half with the edge of your spatula and pop the cap off a couple of beers. With this quality tool, you can stand with confidence as commander of your BBQ party while soaking up the envy of your neighbors. It is weighted well - balanced, not cheap. The cutting edge is sharp and works well. Honestly, it's a shockingly useful tool. After acquiring this I threw out my 3 old spatulas because they just don't compare to the quality and usefulness of this quality tool. I was not paid in any way for this endorsement.
customer_reviews.author: Orweller Family

customer_reviews.title: This one won't get the "bends'.
customer_reviews.text: This spatula is sturdy, well designed, and feels good in the hand. Impressed with the quality of construction. The sharp edge is nice for loosening meats from the grill, or slicing to check on cooking status. Not sure if I'll use the bottle opener feature, but some might. Don't nessasarily like the idea of opening a bottle of brew with a spatula? Maybe useful in a pinch. Stainless cleans easily. I've not net used it for the spatula killing burger press, but it seems like it won't get the "bends" when put under pressure. Good length for grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love this - Awesome Customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time and had no complaints... it is sturdy, long enough and looks good. Then I washed it in the dishwasher. Pulled it out to find that a section of 6 teeth had rusted. *** Update: Customer service reached out to me and sent me a free replacement. Haven't used or cleaned it yet, but i am giving them 5 stars just for Customer Service.
customer_reviews.author: M Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tool! Far better design and materials than I found in the name brands at my big box hardware stores, so I was pleasantly surprised. Was looking for a long handle, good sized spatula to keeps hands cool on our large grill. Fantastic price point! Expecting many years of use from it and we live in San Diego, grilling year round. My only critical comment is having the bottle opener on the spatula may prevent me from using it after It touches the grill/meat. Could it be moved to end of handle?
customer_reviews.author: Xtrainr

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, perfect for Camping!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Spatula, we were looking for something to use while camping on the fire. This spatula is very sturdy, no wobbling or shaking just very solid and sturdy! It was perfect for cooking over the fire, its a good length and you can hold it at the end and nothing bends while you are trying to take burgers off the grill, even a steak didnt make the spatula bend at all! The bottle opener was just an added plus that came in handy more than once :) I would definitely recommend this spatula!
customer_reviews.author: Mike & Sam

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to include in a grilling gift basket for a charity auction, along with the Cave Tools Grill Tongs. Holy moly, these are heavy duty tools! I obviously didn't get to use them, but was very pleased with the apparent quality. We wanted it to be a basket of good quality items, and this did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: PLano

customer_reviews.title: 3 in 1 grill spatula
customer_reviews.text: I just started grilling this summer and I needed a spatula for the grill. It is a wonderful spatula it has a nice serrated edge so I can cut meat without having to dirty a knife. It's dishwasher safe. Flips burgers and steaks easily and has a nice weight to it without being too heavy. I haven't used the bottle opener yet. Its a great 3 in 1 tool and I will be buying more cave tools in the future.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great. Sturdy. Clean. Flips.
customer_reviews.text: Nice design. Hard to tell what the enlarged photo of the neck is showing, but it's not a flat bar out of the handle, it's curved to add strength. Cleans up great. Overall a great grill spatula.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin P. Paddock

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Essential BBQ Tool
customer_reviews.text: This spatula is a great weight for BBQing. It feels sturdy, but not too heavy. The bottle opener is useful and handy for my outdoor cook! We look forward to a summer of using this tool. By the way, the recipe book you can download has lots of interesting sauces and includes video tutorials as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Nancy Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect BarBQ Spatula
customer_reviews.text: “This spatula is the perfect weight because it is not too heavy to be comfortable and thick enough to not bend. The handle is easy to hold for any length of time. It, also, washes well in the dishwasher. We are replacing our Pampered Chef spatula with this one because it was so heavy and difficult to use. This Cave Tool spatula is everything they describe it to be and a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joycep48

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! Heavy duty, not too heavy, well-balanced in the hand, and it can go in the dishwasher. Be careful of the cutting edge, it's the real thing. Going on my Christmas gift list for the guys in my family.
customer_reviews.author: Cath

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and sturdy. I especially like that it's all heavy duty stainless steel because I can keep it cleaner than plastic or silicone handles. This will last longer than I have left. Great price and value. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Messy Miracles

customer_reviews.title: This spatula is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This spatula is so versatile and sturdy. Never saw one like it anywhere. I just needed another spatula because I gave my daughter my old one. So glad I did because this one is so amazing. It scrapes things off the grill so well and I can cut with it to test things. The bottle opener was a extra nice feature. I love this and may get some for gifts to give away. I'm looking forward to checking out their other items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened this, you can tell how high quality it is. Highly recommended. For me I did end up having to return it because it is massive. It is almost as big as my grill. These are great for someone who is a big time griller.
customer_reviews.author: gdaddy

customer_reviews.title: perfect addition to our grilling utensils
customer_reviews.text: This spatula was a Father's Day gift. We used it tonight for the first time, worked as expected. It is very sturdy, durable. The bottle opener is a plus for the griller:) I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Happy Barbeque Lady!!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Sturdy, long enough handle. My last one was to short and my arm felt like it was getting barbequed too. In my opinion great purchase. I had wash everything, so I dont know about dishwasher cleaning. EXCELLENT PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the grill master in your life!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He absolutely loved it! Very heavy duty so seems it will last for a very long time. Cleans super easy. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Singing4God

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this spatula for our camping trips. It has held up great so far for our grilling needs! It is super easy to clean and serves more than one purpose with the addition of the bottle opener. Great addition to our RV!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Spatula
customer_reviews.text: After going through several spatulas for grilling and all of them being a very lightweight material and bending I've finally found a spatula that seems to take a beating. I've tried to bend this as that is my test to see if it's a quality material and I simply can not with this one. I've been using it for 3 weeks now and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J.

customer_reviews.title: "The flipper part is nice and big so I can support a whole burger
customer_reviews.text: The following are comments written to me from the recipient of the spatula I gave him for Christmas: "The flipper part is nice and big so I can support a whole burger.....tried to heat it up to sear a flame shape into the meat....gonna keep trying that one!!!" "...It's perfect...between the bottle opener, serrated edge and size it's perfect....the front of the spatula is also ground with a slope like a razor to help get under the meat....excellent choice!!!! "Oh yeah....It looks cool too!"
customer_reviews.author: Liane Greaver

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grilling spatula. Don't think we have used the bottle opener though. We use a different bottle opener regularly and forget this spatula has one attached.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine on the grill and I thought it was good ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this spatula for Mother's Day and used it our Mother's Day BBQ. It worked fine on the grill and I thought it was good spatula. Per the seller, this can be cleaned in the dishwasher so I did and the spatula came back with a small part rusted! After one wash, the spatula was already rusting on the serrated edge! How does this happen after one cleaning? Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: Liberatr

customer_reviews.title: It's grillin' time!!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is excited to use our new spatula tonight while grilling up some chops. It looks and feels nice and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Alysia

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Spatula!
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product,super sturdy,it looks the part,in general the best spatula i have ever owned.do yourself a favor and add this to your BBQ equipment.i will be looking to purchase other items from Cave Tools
customer_reviews.author: ronmaiden

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a thick and strong spatula and this is it. Plus long enough to reach to back of the grill. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: David A.

customer_reviews.title: Great burger fliiper
customer_reviews.text: Good spatula for flipping burgers on the grill, also the serrated edge and bottle opener are a nice plus
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a HEAVY duty spatula...we use it to lift a large grate from the grill as well as to flip burgers etc. Most are way to flexible...this one is super sturdy ...perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Videoguy93

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and like the bottle opener too! Our old one actually bent -- can't imagine that happening with this one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grice

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use/clean
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best long-handle grilling spatula I've had. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: David Earl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy burger flipper
customer_reviews.text: This BBQ tool is nicer than I expected. Bought for my hubby. He needed a new one. Bottle opener is a bonus. For the price, this thing is great!! It's heavier than I expected and a good size. I was afraid it would be smaller. It's got a serrated side for cutting. Haven't used it yet but it's exactly What I wanted!!
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: This is absolutely the best grill tool I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best grill tool I have ever purchased. Did it on impulse because I broke my hamberger flipper and I am now looking at the whole line of Cave Tools. I plan on giving as gifts to a few of my B-B-Queing friends. The serrated edge is really great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Jean H.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for grill lover
customer_reviews.text: Great grilling spatula. Very sturdy and the extra features make it even better.
customer_reviews.author: RoRo

customer_reviews.title: Love this new cave tool for my hamburgers
customer_reviews.text: “I bought this after getting the cave tools bbq hook and love it for burgers. It has a knife on one side and is made of good quality and looks like it will last a long time. I love all my cave tools so far."
customer_reviews.author: Ray in Ca.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for the bbq grills at our vacation rentals. Our guests will love these sturdy spatulas! Next we will be ordering one for ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spatula.
customer_reviews.text: This Cave Tools spatula is a great tool. I love the sturdiness of the product. It has a great handle that stays cool. The aerated edge is great for cutting into the meat to check how done it is. The spatula part is large and is great for flipping burgers I recommend this toll. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul W. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Super nice quality with fun features like a bottle opener.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Toenies II

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: These spatulas are much stronger than the typical kitchen version. The long handle helps keep your hand away from the coals. I am very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate burger making tool!
customer_reviews.text: Stays outside right next to the grill. Stainless steel so it won’t rust. It only goes inside to be washed. The handy bottle opener is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: jdawg

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Still early on, but so far miles ahead of any other grilling spatula I've owned. Solid metal doesn't bend when exposed to heat or when flipping burgers. Just what I was looking for in a spatula for the grill.
customer_reviews.author: ChaseL

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: After I posted my original review a customer service rep from Cave Tools contacted me and helped resolve my issue. They really do stand behind their products and I couldn't be happier with my new spatula.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it is definitely more heavy duty than most ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is definitely more heavy duty than most of the Spatula's I have used. You can actually use it to scrape the Grill and/or Griddle without bending it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gasman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy as all get-out
customer_reviews.text: The build quality of this tool is something you would expect a professional to use. This puppy is going to live a very long time. It feels good in the hand and a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Randy_H

customer_reviews.title: Spatula + weapon!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great for the grill, and because it is really heavy and has a brutal serrated edge, it seriously could double as a weapon!
customer_reviews.author: Kay Passa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and construction
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and construction. I purchased this as a gift for my sister -- a new gas grill owner. I like the blade/edge to this spatula, and I know her husband will appreciate the bottle opener. I think I may purchase one for myself! Seller followed up with me in several emails - outstanding customer service. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: Handy bottle opener
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy design. Nice and long to keep your hands at a safe distance from the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty and well designed
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty and well designed - I may not have to buy another for years.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: They mean HEAVY DUTY!
customer_reviews.text: When they say heavy duty, they mean it. This spatula feels great in your hand, like you could flip a 5 lb burger with ease. Nice big flipping surface with a bottle opener to keep your thirst under control while cooking! Great product, well made, excited to grill all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Zabler

customer_reviews.title: too big
customer_reviews.text: This is huge like a medieval weapon. Not for kitchen use but outdoor barbecue.
customer_reviews.author: alex wang

customer_reviews.title: One time use then rusted
customer_reviews.text: Finally got around to having a BBQ yesterday. Ran through the dishwasher one time and it started rusting already.. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty product, the only improvement would be to have a longer handle.
customer_reviews.author: Bozeman

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is nice. Seems very sturdy and well made! I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Spatula works great
customer_reviews.text: Spatula works great. Picks up the hamburgers off the grill very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley J. Kalisch

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, great product
customer_reviews.text: Like the sturdiness, you can turn a very large steak, etc. easily.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Barber

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product - excellent quality and have already been enjoying the use of it when BBQing. I highly recommend for others. Cave Tools have been courteous and caring about their service.
customer_reviews.author: Zonie72

customer_reviews.title: Makes for a great gift
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly! My burgers have never flipped so effortlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Jaime C.

customer_reviews.title: Burger and beer approved!
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, not too big or awkward to handle. Does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Large and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Large, sturdy. Exactly as described. This was a great gift for my dad!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy spatula
customer_reviews.text: Normally I don’t like serrated edges on grill spatulas. But this one is so small it doesn’t interfere with flipping burgers. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia P.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy spatula
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy spatula. Used it to lift a 7lb roast with no bending at all.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Willis

customer_reviews.title: Simple.Works.
customer_reviews.text: Replacing a spatula where the handle broke -- won't be an issue with this beast. Surprisingly, best feature is the bottle opener that I didn't think would get used but is constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Todd H

customer_reviews.title: Great Spatula
customer_reviews.text: A very sturdy spatula that is effective on a grill and only a grill. I couldn't be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Has become my favorite BBG accessory-- a thing of beauty.
customer_reviews.author: I. Kahn Teeter-Totter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We throw in the dishwasher and comes out clean. Very easy and handy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Spingirl1

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy and I love the bottle opener which came in ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of these for a big BBQ. They are sturdy and I love the bottle opener which came in handy at the grill. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Top qualityutensil
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what I expected, but this wasn't it. The quality is FAR better than I thought existed in a spatula. I can't imagine that it wouldn't last a lifetime. I didn't notice when I ordered it that it had a serrated edge for cutting... a nice surprise bonus! Would absolutely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Ellison

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy long spatula. Handle stays cool while using on large grill. Just pop it in the dishwasher to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey R. Weigle

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, well made, great length to keep you from the heat
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Cave Tools bbq Spatula,too bad the cavemen did not have it !!
customer_reviews.text: This spatula is very STRONG and Well made ! I love the way it handles burgers and other patties. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the grill
customer_reviews.text: Perfect accessory for the grill, with wide spatula for flipping burgers and long handle
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Stainless steal. Ya, right.
customer_reviews.text: Stainless steal - ya, right. This spatula rusted within a few uses. Would not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Stang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Looks great. This is the third item I've received from Cave tools.
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The spatula was great and did very well with burgers and meats. I would highly recommend!!! Marc. Hickory, NC
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gauge of stainless
customer_reviews.text: Good gauge of stainless, cool handle, good length for reaching for the burger in the back of the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Better quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the better quality BBQ spatulas on the market for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Spatula and handle are only held together with friction. Mine has come loose and falls apart too easily
customer_reviews.author: Jeffre

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty spatula
customer_reviews.text: This spatula feels very heavy duty and sturdy. It also has a nice edge on it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Purchased this for a gift, which I'm sure they'll love.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Tool
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Worked well on Weber and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mav

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: Heavy weight. Well made. Just too expensive for a spatula.
customer_reviews.author: John Bodanzio

customer_reviews.title: Great Barbecue Spatula!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great barbecue spatula! We are very happy with this purchase. If you're looking for a spatula that is sturdy, made very well with a nice long handle, you will love this barbecue spatula!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Sue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for camping! Great quality and arrived when we expected!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Noack

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product, gave it to my dad for Father's Day. He loved it and won't be breaking it anytime soon! (He broke his old one) totally recommend. And great people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavier duty spatula with a serrated edge - Love it!
customer_reviews.author: MoBee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift
customer_reviews.text: It was gift for my hubby. He loves the heft, the length, and the size of the actual spatula.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It seemed sturdy, but the handle material was very thin (I ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't impressed my this spatula. It seemed sturdy, but the handle material was very thin (I assume this helps dissipate the heat, so may be necessary) but didn't seem overall a great buy to be, so returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn N

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used it yet but i am very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but i am very happy with purchase.......nice and sturdy will hold / flip Big Burgers.....well made.....wish handle was a bit longer other than that is great....
customer_reviews.author: Tiare Dream

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and features. You will be hard pressed to find better.
customer_reviews.author: BTBOT

customer_reviews.title: A beast
customer_reviews.text: Great product looks very sturdy hopefully will last a life time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. The angle of the spatula to the handle needs to be greater. After one wash in the dishwasher, it has marks on it. Very poor quality, and not that heavy duty as stated.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Worth spending a couple extra bucks.
customer_reviews.text: Must have for serious bbq people. Flimsy bbq tools suck and this is not flimsy. I can lift a brisket or pork shoulder with the help of a towel in a pan with ease. I don’t worrying about dropping or the spatula bending. Doesn’t get too hot to hold if you do happen to leave it on the grill or smoker while you are working. I like the weight and length. The teeth on the side are great for sliding under food that may be stuck to grill.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-dutytool  but beware of the Cave Tools newsletter
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well-made, heavy-duty spatula is suitable for real grilling on my Weber. If you have a serious griller in your circle, this is an excellent gift. I looked at many spatulas, but none were this strong. Update: I subscribed to the Cave Tools newsletter thinking it would be about grilling tools -WRONG!!! It's a daily diatribe from the owner with a self-aggrandizing mishmash of useless bloviating. It's not about tools. Subscribe at your own risk and unsubscribing remains elusive.
customer_reviews.author: Rheingold

customer_reviews.title: Great Spatula
customer_reviews.text: I needed a Spatula after my Lowes/HD one broke, so I purchased this one. I am very pleased with this purchase. I do not use it very much, but the quality is in this Spatula. It has a jagged side on the end, and it hangs well in my garage. The Spatula is made from Stainless steel and it is well constructed. The length of the Spatula is 17 inches. This Spatula feels good in my hand and has been a joy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: “20% THICKER STAINLESS STEEL” Translation: maybe 20% less likely to bend, but it still bends. I’d trade the stupid bottle opener for a better engineered tool that accomplishes its main task with aplomb any day. This is just more cheap Chinese crap. Price is low enough for me to avoid the hassle of a return. I’ll just use it and cuss when it bends. Would not recommend. Amazon wins again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great size and so easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: I love this spatula..........it is just the right size. It has a serrated edge for cutting into the meat. Saves cleaning a knife! I put it in the dishwasher, as advertised, and it came out sparkling clean! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Mae

customer_reviews.title: I've used it barbecueing about a dozen times now can't think of anything I don't like about it
customer_reviews.text: This spatula is extremely toughduty feeling. I've used it barbecueing about a dozen times now can't think of anything I don't like about it. The long handle is convenient and I appreciate having the sesrated edge on one side for cutting into a piece of meat on the grill. It feels like it should last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, durable bbq tool
customer_reviews.text: The spatula is suitable for turning over burgers but not too wide where it can’t be used for other meats. I also used the bottle opener, which is a cool tool to have while grilling, and the knife is sharp enough to cut through a thick piece of chicken breast.
customer_reviews.author: Traycilyn

customer_reviews.title: VERY well made
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty, can take on the heaviest of burgers, Cleans up easy, dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.author: James Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Well made, sturdy, quality utensil
customer_reviews.text: Great grilling spatula with a long handle to keep your hands away from the heat.
customer_reviews.author: HAD2

customer_reviews.title: Practical...easy. and  strong
customer_reviews.text: Very practical, easy to use in kitchen and at the outside grill. Great item
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty a bit cumbersome but works well. Be very careful with the serrated edge. Very sharp but it’s cool you don’t have to bring a knife outside to check if inside of food is cooked to taste or not.
customer_reviews.author: style lover 56

product_meta.title: Barbecue Spatula With Bottle Opener - Heavy Duty 20% Thicker Stainless Steel - Wide Metal Grilling Turner for Burgers Steak & Fish - Large BBQ Grill Handle - Best Cooking Utensils & Accessories
feature_bullets: *** INSTANT 10% SAVINGS ON PURCHASE OF 2 OR MORE *** SUPER HEAVY DUTY bbq grill spatula - We use 20% thicker stainless steel metal than normal barbecue tool sets so your hamburger flipper is extremely durable and will never bend or break when picking up large pieces of meat
SPATULA BOTTLE OPENER FOR TAILGATING - serrated edge for cutting food, contoured tip for easily flipping meat, oversized face for large steaks - Great gift idea for mom or dad
DISHWASHER SAFE FOR EASY CLEANUP - Extra Wide Hanging Hook with Leather Strap fits on any grill tools holder including Weber Genesis Spirit Big Green Egg and all other barbeque or smoker models
COMES WITH 25 PROFESSIONAL BARBECUE RECIPES - step by step instructions and detailed grilling tutorial videos - Free Download Meat Smoking Journal iOS & Android App
LIFETIME SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If at any point you are unhappy with your heavy duty barbeque spatula you can return it for a full money back refund. We Take Customer Service That Seriously
